job.title: Senior Test Automation Engineer

etc Nodejs a plus with at least 2 years in a role where coding was your primary responsibilityliliBachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering or related fieldliliDemonstrated experience in automation testing in Cloud environments such as AWS Google or AzureliliDemonstrated experience with Selenium Puppeteer or other open source automation testing toolsliliExperience with Unit Testing and Integration Testing frameworksliliExperience with CICD system TeamCity Travis CI Bamboo or JenkinsliliFamiliarity with distributed version control systems such as GitliliDemonstrated ability to
